title.no: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano med kontaktmikrofon
title.en: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano with contact mic

content.no:
Spiller inn Rhodes Mark I elektrisk piano med en kontaktmikrofon (piezo pickup) for å fremheve mekanisk støy fra tines og tangenter. Signalet fra kontaktmikrofonen er så mikset inn med direktesignalet.
Det siste eksempelet er mikset med en Roland PA-120 og jeg brukte den interne fjærklangen samt en båndekko og en digital stereo-klang. Signalet ble så spilt inn på kassett for litt ekstra farging.
Instrument: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano.
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fjærklang, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Recording the Rhodes Mark I electric piano with a contact microphone (piezo pickup) to capture the mechanical noise from the tines and keys. The signal from the contact mic is then blended in with the direct signal.
The last example is mixed down with Roland PA-120 and I used the internal spring reverb as well as a tape echo and a digital stereo reverb. The signal was then recorded it to a cassette tape for some extra color and saturation.
Instrument: Rhodes Mark I Stage Piano.
Effects: Roland PA-120 spring reverb, Fulltone Tube Tape Echo and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Mixer: Roland PA-120.
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Fender Rhodes electric piano being played

name.en: Mix with audio processing and effects

title.no: Kjappe lydeksempler av synth- og Mellotron-oppsettet
title.en: Quick sound examples of the synth and Mellotron setup

content.no:
En kjapp demo av de forskjellige tangentinstrumentene koblet til Roland PA-120 mikseren.
Lyden er innspilt direkte fra mikserens linjeutgang.
Klangen kommer fra den innebygde fjærklangen i mikseren og ekkoet kommer fra en Fulltone Tube Tape Echo koblet til effektsløyfa / inn og -utgang for ekko på mikseren.
Beklager for elendig kameraføring.
Instrumenter: Korg Polysix, Hohner / Logan String Melody II, Korg MS-20, Dreadbox Erebus v2, Doepfer Dark Energy, Roland SH-09, Sequential Circuits Pro-One og Mellotron M4000D.
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fjærklang og Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
content.en:
A quick demo of each keyboard instrument connected to the Roland PA-120 mixer.
The audio is recorded directly from the line out of the mixer.
The reverb comes from the in-built spring reverb in the mixer and the echo/delay comes from the Fulltone Tube Tape Echo connected to the effects loop / echo ins and outs of the mixer.
Sorry for the terrible camera work.
Instruments: Korg Polysix, Hohner / Logan String Melody II, Korg MS-20, Dreadbox Erebus v2, Doepfer Dark Energy, Roland SH-09, Sequential Circuits Pro-One and Mellotron M4000D.
Effects: Roland PA-120 spring reverb and Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Mixer: Roland PA-120.

thumbnailDescription: Doepfer Dark Energy, Dreadbox Erebus v2 and a custom made keyboard with inverted keys

name.no: Doepfer Dark Energy og Dreadbox Erebus
name.en: Doepfer Dark Energy and Dreadbox Erebus

title.en: Synth jam with the Roland PA-120 mixer

content.no:
Tester Roland PA-120 mikser med en liten synth-jam.
Lyden er innspilt direkte fra mikserens linjeutgang.
Klangen kommer fra den innebygde fjærklangen i mikseren og ekkoet kommer fra en Fulltone Tube Tape Echo koblet til effektsløyfa / inn og -utgang for ekko på mikseren.
En Korg Polysix (utenfor bildet) spiller arpeggioene og jeg skrur på/av kanalen på mikseren.
Instrumenter: Korg Polysix, Korg MS-20, Dreadbox Erebus v2, Doepfer Dark Energy og Roland SH-09.
Effekter: Roland PA-120 fjærklang og Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Mikser: Roland PA-120.
content.en:
Testing the Roland PA-120 mixer with a short dawless synthesizer jam.
The audio is recorded directly from the line out of the mixer.
The reverb comes from the in-built spring reverb in the mixer and the echo/delay comes from the Fulltone Tube Tape Echo connected to the effects loop / echo ins and outs of the mixer.
A Korg Polysix (out of the frame) plays the arpeggiator and I just unmute and mute the track with the mixer.
Instruments: Korg Polysix, Korg MS-20, Dreadbox Erebus v2, Doepfer Dark Energy and Roland SH-09.
Effects: Roland PA-120 spring reverb and Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Mixer: Roland PA-120.
